scripts.start: npm install && composer install && npm run build && wp-env start
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently "wp-scripts start" "npx gulp watch"
scripts.update: ncu -u -x '@wordpress/scripts gulp-autoprefixer sass' && rimraf node_modules/ package-lock.json && npm install && npm run build
scripts.copy:files: cp -r build inc languages vendor *.txt *.png *.php dist/vk-blocks-pro
scripts.dist: npm run clean:dist && npm run create:dist-dir && npm run copy:files && composer install
scripts.build:dev: composer install && gulp text-domain-pro && wp-scripts build --webpack-copy-php --config webpack.config.js --progress --mode=development && gulp build:dev:pro
scripts.build: composer install && gulp text-domain-pro && wp-scripts build --webpack-copy-php --config webpack.config.js --progress && gulp build:pro && npm run translate
scripts.build:dev:cache: composer install && gulp text-domain-pro && wp-scripts build --webpack-copy-php --config webpack.config.js --progress --mode=development --env enableCache=true && gulp build:dev:pro
scripts.build:cache: composer install && gulp text-domain-pro && wp-scripts build --webpack-copy-php --config webpack.config.js --progress --env enableCache=true  && gulp build:pro && npm run translate
scripts.build:free: gulp text-domain-free && wp-scripts build --webpack-copy-php --config webpack.config.js && gulp build:free
scripts.translate: npm run build:pot && npm run translate:block && npm run translate:admin && cd languages && wp i18n make-php . && cd ../
scripts.lint: wp-scripts format src/ && wp-scripts lint-js src/ --fix
scripts.lint:php: composer install && composer format && composer phpcs
scripts.fixtures:regenerate: npm run build && npm run fixtures:clean && npm run fixtures:generate
scripts.test-unit: npm run test-unit:clean && npm run fixtures:regenerate
scripts.phpunit: composer install && wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/vk-blocks-pro' vendor/bin/phpunit -c .phpunit.xml
scripts.phpunit:free: composer install && wp-env run tests-cli --env-cwd='wp-content/plugins/vk-blocks' vendor/bin/phpunit -c .phpunit.xml
scripts.reinstall: rimraf node_modules/ && npm install && npm run build
